metadata.synopsis: One liner for Gossiper_001 outside the Baldur's Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the gossiper outside the Baldurs Mouth building in CTY_Main_A at coords 80.5, 41, -22

0.speaker: Caitlin
0.text: You want the who's who and the what's what? Speak to Carys. She's always got the best goss - none of it's been wrong yet.

1.speaker: Caitlin
1.text: It's honestly amazing, I'd have thought Carys' gossip would have been wrong at least once. But no - always bang on.

2.speaker: Caitlin
2.text: Oh my... I read all about you in the gazette. Very impressive...

3.speaker: Caitlin
3.text: Oh no, not you. I know all your nasty tricks - read about them in the broadsheet.
